                            <gmd:role>

                            <gmd:role>

            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>CWWA has been monitoring water quality for over 20 years; we have followed the Province of New Brunswick’s methods for monitoring *B and E. Coli, installed data loggers to measure temperature, and established 23 long-term monitoring sites.  We attempt to sample every two years, and have selected a subset of 10 monitoring sites based on availability of funding for our work.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

            </gmd:topicCategory>

                            </gmd:westBoundLongitude>
                            <gmd:eastBoundLongitude>
                                <gco:Decimal>-65.008056</gco:Decimal>
                            </gmd:eastBoundLongitude>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-5q3x-5g82
notes: CWWA has been monitoring water quality for over 20 years; we have followed the Province of New Brunswick’s methods for monitoring *B and E. Coli, installed data loggers to measure temperature, and established 23 long-term monitoring sites.  We attempt to sample every two years, and have selected a subset of 10 monitoring sites based on availability of funding for our work.

notes_translated.en: CWWA has been monitoring water quality for over 20 years; we have followed the Province of New Brunswick’s methods for monitoring *B and E. Coli, installed data loggers to measure temperature, and established 23 long-term monitoring sites.  We attempt to sample every two years, and have selected a subset of 10 monitoring sites based on availability of funding for our work.
notes_translated.fr: La CWWA surveille la qualité de l'eau depuis plus de 20 ans ; nous avons suivi les méthodes de la province du Nouveau-Brunswick pour surveiller *B et E. Coli, installé des enregistreurs de données pour mesurer la température et établi 23 sites de surveillance à long terme. Nous essayons d'échantillonner tous les deux ans et avons sélectionné un sous-ensemble de 10 sites de surveillance en fonction de la disponibilité des fonds pour nos travaux.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Canaan-Washademoak Watershed Association Water Quality Dataset

title_translated.en: Canaan-Washademoak Watershed Association Water Quality Dataset
title_translated.fr: Ensemble de données sur la qualité de l'eau de la Canaan-Washademoak Watershed Association

title_translation_method.fr: Title text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate
